tool.name: Cluster Profiler GO

configfiles.configfile:
require("clusterProfiler", quietly = TRUE) require("org.Hs.eg.db", quietly = TRUE) require("ggplot2", quietly = TRUE)
gene <- read.table('$input_genelist') ego <- enrichGO(gene = c(gene\$V2), keyType = "ENTREZID", OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db, ont = "BP", pAdjustMethod = "BH", pvalueCutoff = 0.01, qvalueCutoff = 0.05, readable = TRUE)
write.table(ego, '$output_tab') dotplot(ego) ggsave(file = '$output_plot', device = "pdf")

tool.inputs: <param type="data" name="input_genelist" format="txt" help="Data frame with ENTREZID Gene List (in second column)./>
tool.help: This tool provide GO Enrichment Analysis of a gene set. Given a set of genes, this will return the enrichment GO categories after FDR control.
